meanings.definition: A hereditary disorder characterized by abnormal bone growth in the middle ear.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother has otoscleroses, which means her middle ear bones grow strangely.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed him with otoscleroses after noticing unusual bone growth in his middle ear.
meanings.sent3: The family reunion was filled with laughter when Uncle Joe joked about his otoscleroses making him a great listener.
meanings.sent4: Her otoscleroses felt like tiny builders constructing a new world inside her ear.
meanings.sent5: The image of otoscleroses is like a tiny construction crew working in the middle ear.

meanings.definition: The condition of having abnormal bone growth in the middle ear.
meanings.sent1: Living with otoscleroses can be challenging due to the abnormal bone growth in the ear.
meanings.sent2: The specialist explained the symptoms of otoscleroses, which involve unusual bone growth in the middle ear.
meanings.sent3: At the party, Sarah shared a funny story about her otoscleroses causing her to hear music in a unique way.
meanings.sent4: The concept of otoscleroses is like a secret garden growing inside the ear canal.
meanings.sent5: The otoscleroses condition can be visualized as a tiny garden blooming in the middle ear.
